name: Fallen (itch) (BlackNautilus)
description:
Fallen

Fallen project tells the story of "Freiya", an intensivist who works in a hospital, after several events she ends up waking up in a place she does not know. We wanted the aesthetics of the game to be "cartoon" to turn our attention away from the dark history that it hides behind, but we can find darker little details that reveal a bit the story of our protagonist.

Company: Nautilus Studios.

Developers:

- Javier Ballesteros.

- Arnulfo Ortegón.

- Gabriel Torres.

- David Pantoja.
